content: if you re new to knitting this step-by-step guide will teach you how to knit a scarf this free chunky knit scarf pattern is an easy knitting project that is perfect for beginners this guide is designed for beginners so don t worry if you don t know your knits from your purls yet we ll explain everything you need to know **pattern notes** the pattern is worked flat back and forth in row if you want your scarf to come out the same size as ours you ll want to check your gauge **finished size** 8″ by 72″ 20 cm by 183cm **gauge** 11 sts and 20 row = 4″ x 4″ in garter stitch
